Name: DelayedSun
About the game: DelayedSun is a third-person shooter survival horror game set in a post-apocalyptic world filled with flesh-hungry zombies. Melvin has to rescue his kidnapped friend, Elisa. Elisa has been kidnapped by crazy scientists on a remote island. Will Melvin survive his long journey? Key Features : • Immersive Gameplay • Realistic Combat Experience • Realistic Environments • Inventory, Crafting & Skill Tree • Stunning Mission & Storyline WILL YOU SURVIVE? Can Melvin survive and bring Elisa alive?
